fields.title: About Fadhil Mohammed
fields.content:
Fadhil Mohammed, Is an Indian entrepreneur who can be ranked amoung one of the youngest Entrepreneurs in india. At the Age Of 16, He Along with His 2 Best Friends began his journey into business by establishing prospello Global, an Integrated Marketing Company With IT Enabled Services With headquarters in Kerala.

On His 17, Apart From being A Co-founder it didn't took much time for him to prove himself in his management and administration skills, He Took charge as the CEO in the office and lead the administration of the company. Now, Prospello Global Operates in 3 countries with more than 45 crew members and 120 freelance associates on board.

As a young Creative mind Who believes in Business expansions and Good Associations, He Associated With Gedexo Group of Companies and Prospello Global To Form a New Brand Named Bixji international which is exclusively a public Relations Management and Event Solution Company.

His astute business vision and immense passion have evolved ambitious growth plans for all the Businesses he runs and ensured their materialization through a team of people who share his same drive and dynamism.
fields.mission: His new Sets of missions include establishing a different School concept which will bring out a change to the Existing educational system, a eco-friendly Construction Company to beautify the infrastructure of rural parts of the country
fields.vision: His vision and Upcoming concepts in the field of social Development and Charity will surely Bring out to be a life-changing project to many people in society.
fields.dreams: His dreams and missions would seem to be different and odd to his age, but the answer to it is as he believes and says "The bigger your dreams, the earlier you got to start".

fields.title: Bixji international
fields.content: Being an active member in the directorial board of bixji international and Bixji community he is now recognized as one of the Co-founder and director of bixji International.

fields.title: MPB Mobikes
fields.content: By being a strong member in the directorial board of Mpb Business Group, he has stepped into The Automobile Industry and is recognized as the director for mpb mobikes, The authorized Yamaha Dealership For Calicut District, Kerala.

fields.title: Prospello Global
fields.content: He is recognized as one of the Co-founder and director For prospello Global, a integrated Marketing communication with It enabled services based in india, canada and Uk

fields.title: Glee bites Cafe
fields.content: He is the founder and Managing Director for glee bites cafes, a series of restaurant and Cafteria Business based in india.

fields.title: MPB Mobikes Showroom inauguration
fields.content: It was a happy Moment for Mpb Business group and moreover a proud Moment personally for me to keep up our next step into the Field of automobile industry. looking forward for all the success in this segment with hopes and prayers!.

fields.title: Prospello Logo Launch
fields.content: I was extremely honoured and Thankful to have Nk.Mohammed Sir (CMD Vythri Village) To Launch our Logo for Prospello Global, a Integrated Marketing Communication with IT Enabled Services.

fields.title: Prospello Global Headquarters Inauguration
fields.content: A next Step in The Business Career, Apart from having a Business Management Experience it was a very different process in Forming a new company and being a co-founder.Myself and my co-founders were more than happy to Have our parents to inuagrate Prospello Global's Headquarters in Calicut.

fields.title: Mpb Mobikes Balussery branch inauguration
fields.content: His dreams and missions would seem to be different and odd to his age, but the answer to it is as he believes and says " The bigger your dreams, the earlier you got to start".

fields.title: Bixji logo launch
fields.content: Happy to associate with Mr P.Sulaiman Chairman and Managing Director of hilitebuilders on our Logo launch For Bixji International, The best solutions in Public Relations and Corporate Events.

fields.title: Bixji's First Christmas Celebration
fields.content: This Christmas was Fun-filled with Team Bixji, Had a very nice time with my co-founders, Mr Kc Musthafa, Abu thamreeque and the very young and vibrant team of bixji International.
